desc:
📈 Profit Analysis Dashboard
This interactive Power BI dashboard offers a comprehensive view of sales and profit trends across multiple business dimensions. Designed to empower strategic decision-making, it visualizes large datasets into intuitive insights with a vibrant and engaging layout.

🔍 Key Features:
KPI Tiles: Instantly track core metrics:

💰 Total Sales: 2.30M

📈 Total Profit: 286.40K

📦 Total Orders: 5009

Year Selection Buttons: Dynamically filter data by year (2014–2017) to compare performance over time.

Sales Trend Line Chart:
Visualizes monthly sales across selected years to identify seasonal trends and performance spikes.

Category-wise Sales Pie Chart:
Breaks down sales distribution among Technology (36.4%), Furniture (32.3%), and Office Supplies (31.3%), helping stakeholders understand category impact.

Sub-Category Profit Bar Chart:
Highlights top-performing items like Copiers, Phones, and Accessories by profit contribution.

Slicer Filters:

📅 Month: Multi-select months to analyze specific periods.

🌍 Region: Filter by geographical zones (Central, East, South, West).

🧑‍💼 Segment: Analyze customer segments – Consumer, Corporate, Home Office.

🎨 Visual Design:
Soft yellow, blue, and pink tones create a visually engaging yet readable interface.

Clean layout with card visuals and responsive charts for an optimal user experience.

🚀 Tools Used:
Power BI

Data Cleaning & Modeling in Power Query

DAX for KPI and calculated measures

📌 Use Case:
This dashboard is ideal for:

Retail businesses monitoring product/category performance.

Stakeholders making decisions based on sales & profit segmentation.

Annual or quarterly sales reviews by product and region.
title: Sales Analysis  - Profit Analysis
